thread.title: Kaley Cuoco, Ryan Sweeting had screaming fights before split
thread.title_full: Kaley Cuoco, Ryan Sweeting had screaming fights before split - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Kaley Cuoco, Ryan Sweeting had screaming fights before split
text:
Actress Kaley Cuoco and Ryan Sweeting reportedly had screaming fights, daily before their split after almost two years of marriage.
READ: â€‹Kaley Cuoco, Ryan Sweeting split
The Big Bang Theory actress who officially filed for divorce from the professional tennis player Ryan Sweeting, citing "irreconcilable differences" had been getting into screaming fights with Sweeting almost everyday, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
"She may seem like America's sweetheart, but it's actually quite the opposite. She can be a real nightmare at times and incredibly difficult to deal with," InTouch Weekly magazine Quote: d a source as saying.
"She's always been very moody and gets mad at everything. It's affected almost every relationship she's ever been in. These last couple of months have been brutal and extremely tense. Ryan and Kaley were having screaming fights daily - it really just got to be too much," the source added.
The pair tied the knot on December 31, 2013, after dating for six months.
"When it comes down to it, neither one of perfect and they jumped into marriage way too quickly. They were doomed from the start," source said.
